*{box-sizing:border-box;transition:all .2s ease}.rmsc .gray{color:var(--rmsc-gray)}.rmsc .dropdown-content{position:absolute;z-index:1;top:100%;width:100%;padding-top:8px}.rmsc .dropdown-content
